SELECT A.PRICE_ID , A.PRICE_TYPE , B.DL_CD_NM AS PRICE_TYPE_NM , A.AD_LVL , C.DL_CD_NM AS AD_LVL_NM , A.AD_POS , D.TXT_VAL1 AS AD_POS_TYPE , D.DL_CD_NM AS AD_POS_NM , A.UNIT_AMT , A.INST_AMT , A.REMARK FROM AD_STD_PRICE A LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO B ON A.PRICE_TYPE = B.DL_CD AND B.CO_CD = 'PRICE_TYPE' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO C ON A.AD_LVL = C.DL_CD AND C.CO_CD = 'AD_LVL' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO D ON A.AD_POS = D.DL_CD AND D.CO_CD = 'AD_POS'
B.DL_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY PRICE_TYPE ASC
